input_text:
Job Title: Senior MS Dynamics CRM Developer

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About AscendionAscendion is a full-service digital engineering solutions company. We make and manage software platforms and products that power growth and deliver captivating experiences to consumers and employees. Our engineering, cloud, data, experience design, and talent solution capabilities accelerate transformation and impact for enterprise clients. Headquartered in New Jersey, our workforce of 6,000+ Ascenders delivers solutions from around the globe. Ascendion is built differently to engineer the next.
Ascendion | Engineering to elevate life
We have a culture built on opportunity, inclusion, and a spirit of partnership. Come, change the world with us:Build the coolest tech for world’s leading brandsSolve complex problems – and learn new skillsExperience the power of transforming digital engineering for Fortune 500 clientsMaster your craft with leading training programs and hands-on experience
Experience a community of change makers!Join a culture of high-performing innovators with endless ideas and a passion for tech. Our culture is the fabric of our company, and it is what makes us unique and diverse. The way we share ideas, learning, experiences, successes, and joy allows everyone to be their best at Ascendion.
 *** About the Role *** Job Title: Senior MS Dynamics CRM Developer 
Key Responsibilities:Develops and deploys integrated solutions aimed at modernizing, consolidating, and coordinating independently developed and implemented application systems.Determines how existing applications, legacy systems, databases, Web interfaces and operating systems, hardware work together to meet the requirements of the enterprise based on business user needs.Develops reusable patterns/services to solve business problems.Utilize Agile methodologies for development and project process.
Minimum Qualifications:Hands on experience with extending the MS Dynamics 365 platform through configuration as well as code using MS Power Platform, Workflows, Flows, Custom APIs, Plugins and JavaScript with one or more of the following D365 / Dynamics CRM modules: Sales, Customer Service. More than 8 years of experience in system design, application development, software engineering, or other related experience.5 to 7 years of C# .Net development experience along with understanding of testing framework & strategies.Experience in building a data model in CRM to meet business needs including working with custom entities.Experience with Software as a Service (SaaS) and/or Platform as a Service (PaaS) environments.Prior Experience building integrations where CRM is the target as well as initiating integrations from CRM.Must have experience with MS Dynamics 8.x development.Experience building and working with Web APIs, and Web Services.Experience building solutions with MS Power Tools, especially Power Automate flows and PowerBI.
Desired Qualifications:Desirable to have experience developing MS Dynamics365 custom solutions.Experience with Service Development: Web APIs, Microservices and Messaging frameworks: RabbitMQ, Azure Service Bus is a plus. 
Location: This is 100% Remote role (Needs to work as per CST / PST Time Zone).  
Salary Range: The salary for this position is between $70,000– $130,000 annually. Factors which may affect pay within this range may include geography/market, skills, education, experience, and other qualifications of the successful candidate.

Benefits: The Company offers the following benefits for this position, subject to applicable eligibility requirements: [medical insurance] [dental insurance] [vision insurance] [401(k) retirement plan] [long-term disability insurance] [short-term disability insurance] [5 personal days accrued each calendar year. The Paid time off benefits meet the paid sick and safe time laws that pertains to the City/ State] [10-15 days of paid vacation time] [6 paid holidays and 1 floating holiday per calendar year] [Ascendion Learning Management System] 
Want to change the world? Let us know. Tell us about your experiences, education, and ambitions. Bring your knowledge, unique viewpoint, and creativity to the table. Let’s talk!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Determines how existing applications, legacy systems, databases, Web interfaces and operating systems, hardware work together to meet the requirements of the enterprise based on business user needs.
Develops reusable patterns/services to solve business problems.
Utilize Agile methodologies for development and project process.
benefits: [5 personal days accrued each calendar year. The Paid time off benefits meet the paid sick and safe time laws that pertains to the City/ State]
[6 paid holidays and 1 floating holiday per calendar year]

We make and manage software platforms and products that power growth and deliver captivating experiences to consumers and employees. Our engineering, cloud, data, experience design, and talent solution capabilities accelerate transformation and impact for enterprise clients.
